lead_paragraph: GLANTZ--Irwin L.,91, died peacefully at home on December 26, 2015 after a brief illness, with his loving family at his side. He is survived by his beloved wife of 62 years, Gene; devoted children Paul, Judith Kingman, and Robert; grandchildren Alexander and Garrett Kingman and Michelle and David Glantz, and nephew Bruce Kauderer. A consummate gentleman, he was a World War II veteran, lawyer, founder of real estate development, investment and management firm, Windsor Properties, and esteemed patriarch of his extended family. His patience, wisdom, optimism, generosity and strong family values will be sorely missed by all who were privileged to know him. Laid to rest in Sharon Gardens, Valhalla, New York on December 28, 2015. 1/3
